title: This Love (Taylorâ€™s Version)
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:01.02] We were both young when I first saw you
[00:04.72] I close my eyes and the flashback starts
[00:08.24] I'm standing there
[00:11.44] On a balcony, in summer air
[00:16.41] See the lights, see the party, the ball gowns
[00:20.45] See you make your way through the crowd
[00:23.79] And say "Hello"
[00:27.23] Little did I know
[00:31.76] That you were Romeo, you were throwing pebbles
[00:35.46] And my daddy said, "Stay away from Juliet"
[00:39.19] And I was crying on the staircase
[00:41.82] Begging you, "Please don't go"
[00:46.16] And I said
[00:47.67] "Romeo take me somewhere we can be alone
[00:51.35] I'll be waiting, all there's left to do is run
[00:55.46] You'll be the prince and I'll be the princess
[00:59.41] It's a love story, baby, just say yes"
[01:05.08] So I sneak out to the garden to see you
[01:08.83] We keep quiet 'cause we're dead if they knew
[01:12.20] So close your eyes
[01:15.47] Escape this town for a little while, oh, oh
[01:20.65] 'Cause you were Romeo, I was a scarlet letter
[01:24.32] And my daddy said, "Stay away from Juliet"
[01:27.81] But you were everything to me
[01:29.96] I was begging you, "Please don't go"
[01:35.01] And I said
[01:36.37] "Romeo, take me somewhere we can be alone
[01:40.22] I'll be waiting, all there's left to do is run
[01:44.06] You'll be the prince and I'll be the princess
[01:48.08] It's a love story, baby, just say yes"
[01:51.90] Romeo, save me, they're trying to tell me how to feel
[01:55.87] This love is difficult, but it's real
[01:59.80] Don't be afraid, we'll make it out of this mess
[02:03.74] It's a love story, baby, just say yes
[02:10.81] Oh, oh
[02:14.70] 
[02:22.01] But I got tired of waiting
[02:26.28] Wondering if you were ever coming around
[02:29.91] My faith in you was fading
[02:34.65] When I met you on the outskirts of town
[02:37.85] And I said
[02:39.25] "Romeo, save me, I've been feeling so alone
[02:42.65] I keep waiting for you, but you never come
[02:46.69] Is this in my head? I don't know what to think"
[02:50.03] He knelt to the ground and pulled out a ring
[02:54.03] And said
[02:54.53] "Marry me, Juliet, you'll never have to be alone
[02:58.39] I love you, and that's all I really know
[03:02.04] I talked to your dad, go pick out a white dress
[03:06.40] It's a love story, baby, just say yes"
[03:13.23] Oh, oh
[03:16.74] Oh, oh
[03:21.78] 'Cause we were both young when I first saw you
[03:26.21]
